m_szDocTitle: Kia To Make Electric Vehicle That Has Recyclable Materials | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Kia To Make Electric Vehicle That Has Recyclable Materials October 4th, 2013 by Jake Richardson   The Kia Soul is an urban cross-over vehicle that sort of resembles an SUV, but is not as massive and is lower. Kia will make an electric version in 2014. This is an exciting move, considering the base price of the gas-powered Soul is about $14,400. Details such as list price and range currently are scant, but it is known that the Soul EV will have an all-electric engine, meaning it is not a hybrid. About 85% of its materials will be designed to be recyclable when the vehicle has reached the end of
